Game.Name: Duel Masters 3 (Japan)
Game.plot: Duel Masters: Shadow of the Code is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Amble and published by ATLUS,which was released in Japan in 2004.Cheat: Duel Room!In this game, there is a duel room in single player. This lets you use all the cards in the game and use many different charaters from Story Mode.
